about.title: About Me
about.description: Highly motivated web developer with a strong commitment to continuous learning and solid skills in interface design, development, and website maintenance. Demonstrates the ability to work effectively both independently and in collaborative environments, delivering high-quality solutions that meet and exceed client expectations. Passionate about staying up to date with the latest technologies and continually improving technical skills.

experience.title: Experience
experience.job1_desc: I have created and managed educational platforms in Moodle, designing and customizing courses according to user needs. In addition, I have developed web pages using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating interactive and functional content. I have also designed spreadsheets in Excel applying programming logic to automate processes, and implemented automation solutions in Access, optimizing management and information flow.
experience.job2_desc: I have developed programs in Java, carrying out various projects that include the use of databases such as MySQL and the management of Docker containers. In addition to these technologies, I have gained experience in interface design with Figma, deepened my knowledge of JavaScript, and learned a new language, PHP, working with frameworks and libraries such as Bootstrap, AngularJS, and Laravel.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1_desc: I created a personal website to showcase my professional experience in detail.
